com.hybris.services.entitlements.service.impl

Class DefaultGrantService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hybris.services.entitlements.service.impl.DefaultGrantService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GrantService

    public class DefaultGrantService
extends Object
implements GrantService
    Service provides access to the Persistence Manager.

    This is default implementation
